title: How well do you know France? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here’s a little map I’ve made for you. Green are the places where I lived, yellow the places where I’ve been for holidays and vacation, blue the places where I’ve been for work.  Still a few places to discover… Note : I’ve never been to any oversea territories

I have lived in France and Belgium for over four years total. Once over two years, and I taught in a French lycee for one year. I have lived and traveled in france from the early 60's until recently. I have visited the major areas of France and Belgium, and many smaller places, but it is such as rich country that there are many more places to visit and more to learn than one lifetime can contain.
